The Dongpang Coal Mine North Well is an underground coal mine located in Wu Village, Xingtai City, Hebei Province

operators: 冀中能源股份有限公司东庞矿 (Jizhong Energy Co., Ltd. Dongpang Mine)
owners: 冀中能源集团有限责任公司 (Jizhong Energy Group Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine has been in operation since 2007 with a designed capacity of 450,000 tons/year and an approved production capacity of 900,000 tons/year.
